name: Block'n'Shoot
description:
Block'n'Shoot is a 3D shoot-em-up created for the GMTKJam #1.

Use A/D or your Left Stick to move and Left Mouse Click or "A" on your gamepad to charge up your shot.
Each shot takes away your shield, but your shot gets bigger and stronger by doing so.

Enemy spawns and meteorite spawns are random to improve the longevity of the game :)

Tools & Licences:

Music: "Twists" by  Alexander Ehlers  - https://opengameart.org/content/free-music-pack
Sound Effects created with Bfxr - http://www.bfxr.net/
Font: Audiowide by Astigmatic One Eye Typographic Institute - http://www.1001freefonts.com/audiowide.font
Made in Unity 5.6.2f1 Personal - https://unity3d.com/de
Models created with Blender - https://www.blender.org/
